long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Your AI Copilot powered by GPT-4 offering you use all popular Chat LLMs with enhanced features like fast response, Integrated with Google web  search, Chat search, AI characters, Prompt library, etc. You can chat with Multiple LLMs at the same time to get the best answer, and you can ask AI anything in the sidebar, Supports webapp, poe, OpenRouter, Azure and API

ğŸ”¥ AIChatOne is your all-in-one GPT-4 AI assistant. Hit Cmd/Ctrl+B to open sidebar or Cmd/Ctrl+M to open full chat page, and you're in with AIChatOne. AIChatOne offers assistance in various tasks including searching, reading, writing, translating, and more.

âœ”ï¸ Prompt Library: a prompt base that offers a large number of prompts; just hit '/' to quickly access your saved prompts. 
âœ”ï¸ Real-Time Web Access: AIChatOne can answer with the latest internet info. 
âœ”ï¸ Voice Input and Output Support: using microphone button to communicate with the AI in multiple languages. 
âœ”ï¸ Chat Folders: Stay organized by creating your own Chat folders
ğŸ‘‰ Chat and Summary 
âœ”ï¸ Chat with doc: Instantly feed the AI important context by uploading a doc file right into the chat and quickly grasp the core highlight. 
âœ”ï¸ Chat with Image: take a screenshot or upload an image and ask questions based on the content of the image, powered by GPT-4V. 
âœ”ï¸ Webpage Summary: get accurate summaries without having to read entire webpage articles or information. 
âœ”ï¸ YouTube Summary: generate a concise and accurate summary for your convenience in seconds.

ğŸ‘‰ Search
âœ”ï¸ Powerful search and filter so you can find any of your previous chats instantly 
âœ”ï¸ Get AI search results in the sidebar when use google , bing , duckduckgo etc

ğŸ‘‰ Customizable
âœ”ï¸ Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark mode.
âœ”ï¸ Adjusting response â€œtemperatureâ€. 
âœ”ï¸ Theme.

ğŸ’» How to use AIChatOne: 
ğŸ”¸ Click the ""Add to Chrome"" button in the upper right corner and pin it to the toolbar for easy access. 
ğŸ”¸ Simply hit Cmd/Ctrl+B to open sidebar or Cmd/Ctrl+M to open full chat page ,then start chatting with her.
â“ Frequently Asked Questions:
